This App includes the results of paper *A framework for estimating excess mortality during the COVID-19 pandemic by G. Konstantinoudis et al. (2022)*. 

* **Read carefully the `Introduction`** before using the App.

* Estimates for certain age and sex groups at certain NUTS3 areas may be unstable, so you should interpret them with care or use higher levels of aggregation instead.
